metadata.title: CVE-2020-6078 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable denial-of-service vulnerability exists in themessage-parsing functionality of Videolabs libmicrodns 0.1.0. When parsingmDNS messages in mdns_recv, the return value of the mdns_read_headerfunction is not checked, leading to an uninitialized variable usage thateventually results in a null pointer dereference, leading to service crash.An attacker can send a series of mDNS messages to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: vlc package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
